coding.description: A reference to a code defined by a terminology system

text.description: A human language representation of the concept represented by the Coding

Coding.description: A structured representation of a coded/enumerated data value, that includes additional metadata about the code and code system.

code.description: The value of the code itself.

display.description: A human-readable name for the code.

system.description: The code system where the code is defined.

version.description: The version of the code system.

Coding.title: Coding

system.description: The system or namespace that defines the identifier.

type.description: A code that defines the type of the identifier.

value.description: The value of the identifier, as defined by the system.

Quantity.description: A structured object to represent an amount of something (e.g., weight, mass, length, duration of time) - including a value and unit.
Quantity.title: Quantity

system.description: The system or namespace that defines the Study.

value.description: The value of the identifier, as defined by the system.

embargo_date.description: The date on which publication and release of data is permitted.  This data is made available with the condition that it cannot be published or disseminated before this date.  The field is represented as a string in this format: CCYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss[Z|(+|-)hh:mm].

dbgap_accession.description: The link to the dbgap accession record for data associated with this Study. For MVP, will model this as a string, but this could be modeled as an external reference.

ExternalReference.description: An external reference to an ontology, vocabulary or other system

term_id.description: Term identifier with prefix or full url. For example, 9606 for NCBITAXON Human or phs

term_label.description: Human-readable label for the term.  Maps to rdfs:label.

version.description: The version of the ontology or reference source.

ExternalReference.title: ExternalReference
